description: Meshery Models serve as a portable unit of packaging to define managed entities, their relationships, and capabilities.

displayName.description: The display name for the model.

status.description: Status of model, e.g. Registered, Ignored, Enabled ...

registrant.description: Kind of the Connection responsible for the sourcing and registration of entities. Example ArtifactHub, GitHub, Meshery-Istio adapter...

metadata.description: Metadata contains additional information associated with the model.

isAnnotation.description: Identifies whether the model and all its entities should be treated as deployable entity or be treated as logical representation.

published.description: Controls whether the model should be registered inside the registry. When set to false, it takes precedence over published property for its entities (Components/Relationships/Policies).
